member.name: T:LifeInsuranceApi.Controllers.LifeInsuranceController
member.summary: Controller that provides life insurance quotes based on user demographics.

member.name: M:LifeInsuranceApi.Controllers.LifeInsuranceController.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the life insurance quote based on the date of birth and sex.
member.param: The date of birth in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
The sex of the employee, 'male' or 'female'.
member.returns: A life insurance quote based on the provided information.
member.response: Bad Request, missing or invalid parameters.
Forbidden, invalid or missing API token.
Internal Server Error if an unexpected error occurs.

member.name: T:LifeInsuranceApi.Models.LifeInsuranceRequest
member.summary: Represents a request for a life insurance quote calculation.

member.name: P:LifeInsuranceApi.Models.LifeInsuranceRequest.DateOfBirth
member.summary: The date of birth of the person requesting insurance. Used to calculate age-based premium factors.

member.name: P:LifeInsuranceApi.Models.LifeInsuranceRequest.Sex
member.summary: The biological sex of the person requesting insurance. Must be either "male" or "female".

member.name: T:LifeInsuranceApi.Models.LifeInsuranceResponse
member.summary: Represents the response containing life insurance quote information.

member.name: P:LifeInsuranceApi.Models.LifeInsuranceResponse.MonthlyCost
member.summary: The calculated monthly premium cost for the life insurance policy. Value is in colones.
